response.overview: The first episode of Vik Finds, a docu-series about the investigations of UMass Private Investigator Vik Jaisingh, working for tips or interesting trades. In this jazz fuelled pilot, he must solve the case of finding a client. Marketing across campus, the farmer's market, and closing a couple of cases along the way, Vik navigates his desire to do good in a world that seems indifferent to it.
response.title: Vik Finds A Client
